articles.title: When a person is arrested by ICE, families, advocates, and local officials sometimes have to piece together who was taken
articles.description:
“Sometimes family members immediately come to us, so we know who a detainee is right away. Other times it takes more effort and help from a range of directions after someone is detained.” 

The post When a person is arrested by ICE, families, advocates, and local officials sometimes have to piece together who was taken appeared first on Boston.com.
